pkgmetadata.longdescription: GlusterFS is a cluster file-system capable of scaling to several peta-bytes. It aggregates various storage bricks over Infiniband RDMA or TCP/IP interconnect into one large parallel network file system. GlusterFS is based on a stackable user space design without compromising performance.

use.flag: Use IPv6 by default, requires libtirpc
Build against net-libs/libtirpc for RPC support
